author: rdonkin
msg: Added util to base layer of build

author: damrhei
msg: Provide new signature TransportUtils.createSOAPMessage(MessageContext, boolean). This will allow the caller to dictate if the underlying DetachableInputStream should be detached upon return. If set to true is specified, and there is a DetachableInputStream present on the MessageContext, the 'detach' mehtod will be called before close.

msg: Fix for bug 45582 - handle extra bytes after the EOFRecord
